bug.description:
Trying to use the "rotation" statement within config.yml setting the display to "rotation: 180". This has no effect on the image. To Reproduce Change display section in config.yml: ui: fps: 0.0 display: type: 'waveshare27inch' color: 'black' rotation: 180 Expected behavior screen should rotate 180 from current orientation. Environment (please complete the following information):
Pwnagotchi version: (v1.1.0b) OS version 10.1 Type of hardware Pi 3b+ Any additional hardware used No
